name: Pump the Blob!
description:
Pump the Blob, avoid spikes and eat orbs in this adorable single tap arcade game!
Wanna play as pizza or a creepy eye? We've got it covered for ya!

Unlock new skins, finish achievements and compete with your friends all over the world in global and local leaderboards.

How to play:
• Tap and hold to grow
• Release to shrink
• Avoid spikes
• Collect and eat orbs

Core features:
• single tap game
• arcade style progress
• colorful and vivid graphics
• many kawaii skins to unlock
• and many more!

Start playing Pump the Blob!, the most adorable single tap game, today - join Orbital Knight community loved by millions all over the world.

Follow us to get news and updates:
